sect2.title: System.Floor
sect2.para: This operator rounds down to the nearest Integer. It takes and returns a double or a decimal, but will return a value that could be represented as an integer. This is done because it still allows you to multiply and divide by a power of ten (or any other number) to round to different precisions. An integer can be easily attained by converting to an integer.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: select TableDee add { Floor(-3.4) Neg, Floor(3.4) Pos };
